synonyms.synonym: PH, SEC7 and coiled-coil domain-containing protein 3

protein.general_function: Involved in ARF guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Promotes guanine-nucleotide exchange on ARF1. Promotes the activation of ARF through replacement of GDP with GTP

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of arf protein signal transduction

reference.reference_text: Venkateswarlu K, Gunn-Moore F, Oatey PB, Tavare JM, Cullen PJ: Nerve growth factor- and epidermal growth factor-stimulated translocation of the ADP-ribosylation factor-exchange factor GRP1 to the plasma membrane of PC12 cells requires activation of phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase and the GRP1 pleckstrin homology domain. Biochem J. 1998 Oct 1;335 ( Pt 1):139-46.

Franco M, Boretto J, Robineau S, Monier S, Goud B, Chardin P, Chavrier P: ARNO3, a Sec7-domain guanine nucleotide exchange factor for ADP ribosylation factor 1, is involved in the control of Golgi structure and function. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1998 Aug 18;95(17):9926-31.
